body_html:
We can have .so.1 and it will continue to resolve for all minor versions. If we want to make a
requirement we can have a symbol required, like GLIBC does.

I can add a test with objdump -p <some_sofile> | grep SONAME, is that what you mean?
body_text:
We can have .so.1 and it will continue to resolve for all minor versions. If we want to make a
requirement we can have a symbol required, like GLIBC does.

I can add a test with objdump -p <some_sofile> | grep SONAME, is that what you mean?
body:
> We can have .so.1 and it will continue to resolve for all minor versions. If we want to make a 
> requirement we can have a symbol required, like GLIBC does.

I can add a test with `objdump -p <some_sofile> | grep SONAME`, is that what you mean?
